summary: A lot to do with science and data ;)

- Created dashboards using R and Tableau to communicate clinical study metrics and operational throughput
- Developed landing page and laboratory request portal, including back-end data structure to streamline support requests and gather system quality metrics
- Performed ad hoc data analysis to support ongoing clinical studies conducted by laboratory groups using Python, R and SQL

Developed data pipeline to consistently gather insights on battery performance against time and initial hardware characteristics
- Developed ML model to predict battery lifetime from initial hardware characteristics
- Implemented genetic algorithm to determine optimal model parameters
